name: SpinNFT
description: Spin Industry is a fintech and Web3 ecosystem built on BNB Smart Chain, designed to connect DeFi, NFT, GameFi, and AI applications under one utility token, SPIN. The token functions as a medium for payments, governance, staking, and rewards across platforms such as Spin Farm, Spin NFT, and Spin Game. The project aims to create an integrated ecosystem that empowers users with secure, transparent, and scalable blockchain-based solutions.
